description:
Class 3 has been enacting a charm for the past 26 years to counteract the "calamity." This was the reason behind everything that seemed odd to Kouichi since he joined the class. Kouichi accepts the circumstances of the charm, though he thinks it`s unreasonable, and begins to spend more time with Mei. He also sets out investigating Yomiyama North`s history in the school library...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Face à face - Tous les deux
